## JsonRpcProvider.minerActiveSectors() method

returns info about sectors that a given miner is actively proving.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
minerActiveSectors(address: string, tipSetKey?: TipSetKey): Promise<ChainSectorInfo[]>;
```
